data.message: Mr Marshall, how i hope one day I can write like you do. I  am wondering today that how many musicians can be found to be decent and trustable? Music can comfort, but can music rescue one person from being bulleyed and rescue the soul? I am feeling really hopeless right now.

replies.message: Ill pray for you. Find a network. Every state has one , from old days when rap battle circuts were parkinglots now there venues.. #ohio has one i know for sure try #mikefeez he's great guy.
